chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
eqc_refl : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
MF.card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (MF.Iter_orb m x) = MF.Iter_upb m x
MF.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MF.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
B_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k x = B m k (A_1 m k x)
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
pred_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k x -> top m k x <> A_1 m k x
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
A_1_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k x = nil
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
eqc_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {eqc m x y} + {~ eqc m x y}
MF.upb_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> (MF.Iter_upb m x + MF.Iter_upb m y <= ndN m)%nat
A_1_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> x -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
McA0.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m Md0.k z)
McA1.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m Md1.k z)
McA0.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md0.k (cA_1 m Md0.k z) = z
McA1.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md1.k (cA_1 m Md1.k z) = z
inv_hmap_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (B_1 m k x)
A_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B m k x) k (A m k x) = nil
A_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B_1 m k x) k (A_1 m k x) = nil

``` 
intros m k x H1 H2.
unfold eqc.
elim m. 
- intro H; contradiction.
- intros m0 y p q H3 H4. 
  split.
  + intro H5; left; split; [reflexivity| assumption].
  + apply H4; assumption.
- intros m0 k0 y z H3 [H4 H5].
  destruct (eq_dim_dec k0 k).
  + destruct (eq_dart_dec z x).
    * right; left; symmetry; assumption.
    * destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) x).
      -- left; split; [reflexivity | assumption].
      -- right; split; [apply H4; assumption | right; split; assumption].
  + apply H5.
Qed.
```

original: intros m k x H1 H2. unfold eqc. elim m. - intro H; contradiction. - intros m0 y p q H3 H4. split. + intro H5; left; split; [reflexivity| assumption]. + apply H4; auto. - intros m0 k0 y z H3 [H4 H5]. destruct (eq_dim_dec k0 k). + destruct (eq_dart_dec z x). * right; left; symmetry; auto. * destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) x). -- left; split; [reflexivity | assumption]. -- right; split; [apply H4; assumption | right; split; assumption]. + apply H5.
